message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset that I believe could be of significant benefit to your business.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.  I understand this is a substantial investment, but I believe the potential returns are equally significant. If you're interested, I'd be happy to provide you with more information.  Please let me know your decision.
